summary: Two different women - a young photo model and her boss - dream about a happy life with beloved men. Their dreams are as different as they are.
cast: Eva Dahlbeck|Harriet Andersson|Gunnar Björnstrand|Ulf Palme|Inga Landgré|Benkt-Åke Benktsson|Sven Lindberg|Kerstin Hedeby|Siv Ericks|Gösta Prüzelius|Sigvard Törnqvist|Ninni Arpe|Asta Backman|Ingmar Bergman|Margaretha Bergström|Björn Bjelfvenstam|Renée Björling|Axel Düberg|Jessie Flaws|Git Gay|Ludde Gentzel|Inga Gill|Elsa Hofgren|Maud Hyttenberg|Curt Kärrby|Carl-Gustaf Lindstedt|Millan Lyxell|Richard Mattsson|Marianne Nielsen|Gunhild Qvarsebo|Inga Rosqvist|Bengt Schött|Greta Stave|Tord Stål|Viola Sundberg|Ella Welander|Gerd Widestedt|Naima Wifstrand|Folke Åström|Per-Erik Åström
title: Sueños
